name: arrayDelete
description:
Deletes the first element in an array that matches the value of `value`.
The search is case-sensitive.
Returns `true` if the element was found and removed.
The array will be resized, so that the deleted element doesn't leave a gap.

params.name: value
params.description: A value for which to search. Case-sensitive.

params.name: scope
params.description: Lucee4.5+ remove one (default) or all occurrences of the value

examples.title: Delete an element from an array
examples.description: Uses the arrayDelete function to delete an element from an array

examples.title: Delete an element from an array using the Array member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Invoking the delete function on an array is the same as running arrayDelete.
